name: Fight Party
description:
Whether it’s playing around or having a full-on competition, Fight party’s random map generation and weapons allows for a new battle to occur every round. Have a refreshed experience every round or pick and choose between what weapons you’d like to spawn.
However there can only be one winner.

  • 2 - 8 player split-screen multiplayer
  • Random items
  • Themed levels
  • Random level generation with varying sizes
  • Themed sudden death for each map
  • Easy to learn/use fighting combo system
  • Throwable hazard ball that generates a random event
